it_services.summary: Sharda University's IT Service Department provides comprehensive support, managing the campus network, data center, and internet bandwidth 24/7. They offer IT help desk support through email, phone extensions (2856/2858), and in-person visits to the SDS Building. The IT services department creates user credentials for Wi-Fi access, with a process for forgotten passwords involving OTP verification via registered mobile numbers. Users can connect to the "WIFI_SHARDA" SSID and log in using their provided credentials.
it_services.raw_content:
IT Help Desk Support
• IT Help Desk Support
• How To Access Campus Wi-Fi
Sharda University has a very professional systematic support and delivery system. The purpose of
IT Service Department of the University is to ensure that users receive appropriate help in a timely
manner. Our service department is staffed with trained network and system administrators who care
for users Laptops/Desktops and network up and running. IT service management activities – drived
by policies, organized and structured in processes and supporting procedures – that are performed by IT
service department to design, plan, deliver, operate and control information technology (IT) services
offered to customers. User’s satisfaction is our number one priority. Assigning tasks to support
engineer throughout each work day that are based on SLAs, support engineer availability, and the
IT service department take care Data Center Management & distribution of Internet bandwidth
and maintained to server 24 X 7. To ensure proper connectivity and throughput a proper systematic
layout plan put in place (Fiber & Copper Both). Wi-Fi Network is also Design & lay in the campus for
users.
To ensure proper IT service delivery we have Helpdesk system in place, user can also approach
over phone and mail for any type of IT support. A dedicated team of 18 skilled staff has been deputed
in different place to deliver IT services promptly.
IT Help Desk Support System
For any IT related inconvenience you can contact us through any of the following channels.
Register your issue by
Email on IT Help Desk.
Ext. Number 2856/2858
(within office hrs. only)
Visit to Data Center
First Floor SDS Building
SHARDA Wi-Fi Registration Process
The Mandatory Requirements For Wi-Fi Registration
SYSTEM ID / EMPLOYEE ID
Each student and employee in Sharda Campus is identified by his/her unique ID. The 10-digit student ID is provided by the Admissions cell to the students and the 7-digit Employee ID is provided by the HR to the staff.
IT-Services create User ID and Password and share the credentials with the students and employee via email.
Forget password option is available to generate the new password.
How To Access Campus Wi-Fi
• Connect with WIFI_SHARDA SSID.
• Wi-Fi login page will pop-up now.
• Enter the Wi-Fi login credentials shared on email to login on Wi-Fi login form.
• Any user initiates a password reset request; they will be asked to provide their registered mobile number.
• An OTP will be sent to the user's mobile number for verification purposes.
• After successfully verifying the OTP, the user will be allowed to reset their password securely.
Need help with your IT Related Issue?
Our customer support team is standing by to answer any questions you might have!
Contact us at ithelpdesk@sharda.ac.in or call at 2856/2858.
First Floor Dental Building
Sharda University
